title: Kennen Skin
body: I have been playing since season 3 and Kennen has been my favorite champion ever-since. Every time there is a patch I look to see what new skins have hit the PBE and I am disappointed week in and week out. I know that other old champions need skins too, but Kennen has seen alot of popularity in the LCS throughout the years and I think he deserves a new skin.

replies.body: We thought Kennen needed a new skin, too! Blood Moon Kennen just hit PBE! :D
I know i just saw and it looks amazing I'm super excited you guys did a really good job on the new Kennen skin and I couldn't be happier!!!

~~I love Blood Moon Kennen so much already, but the slow roll on the splash art is killing me.~~
Edit: OHMYGODILOVEIT!
I need a signed print of it immediately.
[I have a MIGHTY NEED!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iPleY9fh3YE)
I save a bunch of threads for things like this. :P

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-er9Um0E03Mw/VsUL8aRuDlI/AAAAAAAA4E0/7OxBm9tEhnM/s1600/Kennen_Splash_6.jpg

The Blood Moon Kennen skin splash looks pretty sweet too!

Love how it references his lore of running up the wall of the Placidium in Ionia too! Thanks agin! :D
